City Council

Meetings

Boerne City Council holds regularly scheduled meetings at 6 p.m. on the second and fourth Tuesday of each month at City Hall, 447 N. Main Street.

  • Public Participation in Open Meetings

Agendas and Minutes

Agendas will be published at least three business days prior to each meeting and can be found within the calendar event. Meeting packets will be published no later than 72 hours before each meeting. Minutes are available following approval.

  • Agendas and Minutes

Watch Live and Recorded Meetings

All City Council meetings can be watched live or recorded online and on the City of Boerne Facebook.

  • City Calendar

City Council Members

The five current council members listed below are elected by the residents in their district and serve on staggered three-year terms.

  • Email All Council Members
  • Interactive Council District Map
